npcs.name: Ghost
npcs.description: A tired ghost of a a lost explorer; will this be your fate?
npcs.reply:
I once was an explorer, looking for treasures unknown,
Who got lost in this maze, my fate all my own.
Trapped in this labyrinth, now a ghostly guide
A puzzling place where time coincides
Now I guard these secrets with my soul,
And won't let you pass without a toll.
Solve the riddle and pass you shall,
But should you fail, your journey ends here, with no avail.

npcs.name: Guard
npcs.description: An imposing figure who wields a sharp curved blade
npcs.reply:
State your purpose, don't delay or roam,
Or else you'll face my blade alone.

npcs.name: Knight
npcs.description: A noble Knight whose weapon has fell many an enemy.
npcs.reply:
Greetings, adventurer, with a heart full of might,
My blade has vanquished foes both evil and blight.

npcs.name: Samurai
npcs.description: A skilled warrior who lives by a code of honor that is known as bushido.
npcs.reply:
Greetings, adventurer, with respect to unfold,
I am bound by bushido, a code so bold.

npcs.name: Merchant
npcs.description: A traveler who is too exhausted to go forward. He sees great potential in you.
npcs.reply:
Greetings, adventurer, with a heart full of hope,
But my journey has drained me, and I am struggling to cope. I seek a treasure of immense value and might,
But my strength is waning, and my resolve is losing the fight. Your journey is inspiring, and your spirit so bright,
I see great potential in you, and your will to fight
